mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_list(project_join_no, project_name, project_photo, chat_name, chat_content, start_date, end_date, content) VALUES (#{projectJoinNo}, #{projectName}, #{projectPhoto}, #{chatName}, #{chatContent}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{content})
INSERT INTO project_join_list(project_join_list_no, project_join_no, user_no, status) VALUES (null, #{projectJoinNo}, #{userNo}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT project_join_no as projectJoinNo FROM project_join ORDER BY project_join_no DESC limit 1

SELECT project_list_no as 'projectListNo', project_join_no as 'projectJoinNo', project_name as 'projectName', project_photo as 'projectPhoto', chat_name as 'chatName', chat_content as 'chatContent', start_date as 'startDate', end_date as 'endDate', content FROM project_list
select count(project_join_no) from project_join_list where project_join_no = #{projectJoinNo}
select name from users where user_no in (select user_no from project_join_list where project_join_no=#{projectJoinNo})
